statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 4 \, x - 3 , -16 \, x^{3} + 26 \, x^{2} + 20 \, x - 8 , -6 \, x^{3} + 11 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x - 3 , -5 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 1 , 4 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
